decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall provide two swift boxes close to the eaves of the mansard roof extension prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of biodiversity.</p>

<p style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 11pt;"></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 11pt;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.28; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where applicable) of the permeable 'finish' and water butt with overflow shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-45cf168e-7fff-4817-2de0-1fe54be0972a"></span></p><p style="list-style-type: disc; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline; margin-left: 11pt;"><ul></ul></p><p style="line-height: 1.28; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">In the event that groundwater is encountered during excavation, a groundwater mitigation plan should be submitted to the LPA for approval to ensure that flood mitigation measures are implemented.</span></p><p style="line-height: 1.28; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span></p><p style="line-height: 1.28; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To mitigate against the impacts of surface water flooding.<br></span></p>

<p>Full details, with samples, of the materials to be used on the external surfaces of the buildings, including glazing, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to commencement of the relevant part of the works. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</p>

<p>Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work on the relevant part is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved.</p><p>a) 1:20 elevations of the windows in the front lightwell.</p><p>b) Materials details of the front lightwell and windows.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.&nbsp;</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
description: Erection of a mansard-style roof extension, erection of a rear single storey side infill extension, lowering of basement with light well and new windows to basement.
